short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension accelerates YouTube ads and skips them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SwiftSkip: Simple Adblock for YouTube™

Embrace the flow of uninterrupted videos with SwiftSkip – Your personal fast-lane through YouTube!

Enter the No-Wait Zone on YouTube

Longing for a seamless viewing experience on YouTube without disruptive ads? SwiftSkip offers you the ultimate solution – a smart, efficient, and user-friendly way to streamline your video watching. It's time to switch from pause-and-play to play-and-enjoy!

Core Features:

- Almost Seamless Ad Skipping: With SwiftSkip, you can forget about the countdown timers. Ads are skipped automatically, offering you a direct pass to the content you're eager to watch.
- Effortless Experience: Designed to be plug-and-play, SwiftSkip requires no configurations. Install it, and it's ready to go – it's that simple!
- Light on Resources: Optimized to ensure it doesn't slow down your computer or your browsing speed. SwiftSkip is like a featherweight champion – small but powerful!
- Respect for Privacy: Your online privacy is a priority. SwiftSkip functions without tracking your activity or collecting your data.

Why SwiftSkip Stands Out:

- Delivers a cleaner, more focused YouTube experience.
- Reduces distractions, so you enjoy more of what you love.
- It's incredibly straightforward – no technical knowledge required.

Getting Started:

1. Add SwiftSkip to your Chrome browser with just a click.
2. Navigate to YouTube and start watching any video.
3. Experience the joy of ad-free viewing as SwiftSkip does its magic.
4. Dive into an endless stream of content, now smoother than ever.

Your Privacy Matters:

SwiftSkip values your privacy as much as you do. We guarantee that the extension operates with complete transparency and does not interfere with your personal data.

Disclaimer:
SwiftSkip: Simple Adblock for YouTube is not endorsed or affiliated with YouTube, Google Inc., or any of its subsidiaries. The extension is developed to enhance the user experience on YouTube.
